title: BBC Our World 2015 The Bangladesh Blogger Murders 720p x264 AAC
description:
The Bangladesh Blogger Murders

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Mukul Devichand, published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Our World series in 2015 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/f/fa/The-Bangladesh-Blogger-Murders-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Mukul Devichand reports on the mood amongst bloggers in Bangladesh following the murders of four atheist internet bloggers, apparently for challenging religious beliefs.
